survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Electric Vehicle (EV) Public Charging Stations Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from electric vehicle (EV) owners about their experiences and satisfaction levels with public EV charging stations.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for simplicity.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: Which of the following public EV charging networks have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format. Add an 'Other' option with a text field for input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkbox) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following public EV charging networks have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for better measurement of satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio button) with a 5-point scale.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area? (1 = Very dissatisfied, 5 = Very satisfied)

questions.question_text: What are the biggest challenges you face when using public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What are the biggest challenges you face when using public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your most frequently used public EV charging network to other EV owners?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents who selected at least one charging network in Q2
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to measure recommendation likelihood.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your most frequently used public EV charging network to other EV owners?
script.routing_logic: All respondents who selected at least one charging network in Q2
